post_message: Did you see the Netflix series Making a Murderer? Remember Jerome Buting, one of the defense attorneys? PolitiFact Wisconsin recently checked his claim that Wisconsin pays criminal defense lawyers who represent the indigent $40 per hour, "the lowest in the country." That rated a Mostly True.

commenter_b: I think they should be sent back to Africa.
